children.name: translateWith

parameters.name: vector `kendo.geometry.Point|Array`
parameters.description: The vector of translation. Can be either a Point instance or an [x, y] array.

children.description: Translates the point by using a Point instance as a vector of translation.

children.name: translate

parameters.name: dy `Number`
parameters.description: The distance to move along the Y axis.

parameters.name: dx `Number`
parameters.description: The distance to move along the X axis.

children.description: Translates the point along the x and y axis.

children.name: transformCopy
children.description: Applies a transformation on a copy of the current point.The callee coordinates will remain unchanged.

children.name: transform
children.description: Applies a transformation to the point coordinates.The current coordinates will be overriden.

children.name: toString

parameters.name: separator `String` *(default: " ")*
parameters.description: The separator to place between coordinates.

children.description: Formats the point value to a string.

children.name: toArray
children.description: Returns the point coordinates as an [x, y] array.

children.name: setY
children.description: Sets the y coordinate to a new value.

children.name: setX
children.description: Sets the x coordinate to a new value.

children.name: scaleCopy
children.description: Scales the point coordinates on a copy of the current point.The callee coordinates will remain unchanged.

children.name: scale
children.description: Scales the point coordinates along the x and y axis.

children.name: round
children.description: Rounds the point coordinates to the specified number of fractional digits.

children.name: rotate

parameters.name: center `kendo.geometry.Point|Array` *(default: [0, 0])*
parameters.description: The rotation center. Can be a Point instance or an [x, y] array.

parameters.name: angle `Number`
parameters.description: Angle in decimal degrees. Measured in clockwise direction with 0 pointing "right".Negative values or values greater than 360 will be normalized.

children.description: Rotates the point around the given center.

children.name: move
children.description: Moves the point to the specified x and y coordinates.

children.name: equals
children.description: Compares this point with another instance.

children.name: distanceTo

parameters.name: point `kendo.geometry.Point`
parameters.description: The point to calculate the distance to.

children.description: Calculates the distance to another point.

children.name: clone
children.description: Creates a new instance with the same coordinates.
